content.question: The major drawback of the open-field (threefield) agricultural system was that

choices.label: it relied on individual farming methods
it prohibited the communal use of oxen and other farm animals
every year a substantial portion of the land was not planted
insects regularly devastated the crops and infected the herds
thieves were able to steal crops easily

content.answer: every year a substantial portion of the land was not planted
